alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Clay; Early (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 11:31AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Henry County in southeastern Alabama, southeastern Clay, southwestern Calhoun and Early Counties in southwestern Georgia through 1215 PM EDT/1115 AM CDT/... At 1131 AM EDT/1031 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Columbia, or 11 miles southeast of Abbeville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Blakely, Arlington, Douglasville, Damascus, Haleburg, Bluffton, Barnes, Parksville, Hardwickburg, Grandberry Crossroads, Hayes, Rock Hill, Colomokee, Cuba, Commissary Hill, Turman, Miller, Ferrell Crossroads, Early Co A/p and Old Damascus. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM EDT/300 PM CDT/ for southeastern Alabama...and southwestern Georgia.
